name: AliceHamsenTalk
_source: # Occurs when Alice talks to Hamsen.
speak;Alice;Sir -{w} father,{w} who are those two magicians,{w} and how do the two princes know them?

speak;Hamsen;Claude and Claudia?{w}{clear}Their Father -{w} the twins' father -{w} his name,{w} for some reason,{w} escapes me...{w} anyway, he was an aristocrat,{w} one of the more influential members of the aristocracy,{w} and good friends with King Gustave.{w}{clear}They would visit each other often just out of pleasure,{w} to discuss -{w} well I'm not quite sure. Doubtless something important.{w}{clear}I had just been made head of the Royal Guard,{w} so I was able to witness their first meeting.{w}{clear}In that usual sociable sort of way kids are at that age,{w} they quickly struck up a friendship. And now, they're here.{w}{clear}Though I'm not sure why.{w}{clear}I'll ask Anthony.
